metadata.title: RZ/A1 group, RZ/A2M, RZ/A3UL: APP: Adjusted Peak Performance

sections.content:
Question:
What is the value of APP (Adjusted Peak Performance)?
Answer:
RZ/A1 group (RZ/A1H, M, L, LU, LC)
APP=0.000120 WT

RZ/A2M
APP=0.000158 WT

RZ/A3UL
APP=0.001200WT
Suitable Products
RZ/A1H, RZ/A1M, RZ/A1L, RZ/A1LU, RZ/A1LC
RZ/A2M
RZ/A3UL
